mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hamlet Medal [for] Mr. Robert Breen
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In appreciation of your brilliant presentation of Hamlet The National Open Air Stage Performance at Kronborg in the Summer of 1949 together with the State Theatre of Virginia The Elsinore Town Council hereby takes pleasuse in awarding to Mr. Robert Breen the official Hamlet Medal of the Town of Elsinore.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Abingdon, Washington county, Virginia, United States
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
